text: Ardian Turku is a member of the Assembly of the Republic of Albania for the Democratic Party of Albania. He formerly served as mayor of Elbasan between 2003 and 2004. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Democratic Party of Albania politicians Category:Mayors of Elbasan Category:Members of the Parliament of Albania Category:21st-century Albanian politicians Category:Culture ministers of Albania Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ardian Turku
